TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PresenceState extends Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceCategory

Docs.summary: This class represents the state presence category and denotes the availability of a presentity.

remarks.para: UserEndpoints are strongly advised to use the API so that the instance is published in appropriate containers that allow the aggregation script to react accordingly.
Application endpoints usually prefer to skip any aggregation logic and publish their aggregate state directly since they don't do any watcher management.
When subscribing to remote presentities, this category is automated requested for.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceCategoryWithMetaData category) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the PresenceState class.
Docs.exception: Thrown when category.Name is anything other than PresenceCategoryNames.State or the XML representing category.Category provided is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public PresenceState (Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceStateType stateType, int availability, Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceActivity activity);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceStateType stateType, int32 availability, class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceActivity activity) cil managed
Public Sub New (stateType As PresenceStateType, availability As Integer, activity As PresenceActivity)

Docs.param: Type of presence state(MachineState/AggregateMachineState/AggregateState/UserState) instance being created.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the PresenceState(MachineState/AggregateMachineState/AggregateState/UserState) class.

remarks.para: A presence state type of CalendarState or PresenceState cannot be created with this constructor. For PresenceState use the constructor which specifically takes phone uri as one of its parameters.

Docs.param: Whether Phone state is for RCC, VoIP or PSTN calls.
The tel URI for the presence state.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the phone state category.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::PresenceActivity ^ Activity { Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::PresenceActivity ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::PresenceActivity ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the activity token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Availability As PresenceAvailability

Docs.summary: Gets the availability for presence state.

remarks.para: This is typically used in application UI to show the availability of user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long AvailabilityValue { long get(); void set(long value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the numeric value of availability of presence State, returns -1 if availability value is unknown.
Constant with value -1, represents the unknown availability value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.ExpiryPolicy CreateExpiryPolicy() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateExpiryPolicy () As ExpiryPolicy

Docs.summary: Determines the expiry policy for this category.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance int64 CreateInstanceId(class Microsoft.Rtc.Signaling.RealTimeEndpoint endpoint) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateInstanceId (endpoint As RealTimeEndpoint) As Long

Docs.summary: Determines the instance id for this category.

remarks.para: To determine the instance id for the state category, the state type is required as the instance id is a function of the state type. In some cases such as PhoneState, the instance is already determined at the time of construction of the object so there is no need to determine its value again.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::DeviceType DeviceType { Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::DeviceType get(); void set(Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::Presence::DeviceType value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the device type for MachineState/AggregateState/AggregateMachineState.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the operation is invalid for the given state type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property EndpointAway As PresenceState

Docs.summary: MachineState is Away.

remarks.para: Availability is 15500 and activity is "away".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property EndpointIdle As PresenceState

Docs.summary: MachineState is Idle-Online.

remarks.para: Availability is 5000 and activity is "idle".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EndpointLocation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the endpoint location with values such as "home", "office", "mobile", or custom location.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property EndpointOnline As PresenceState

Docs.summary: MachineState is Online.

remarks.para: Availability is 3500 and activity is "online".

Docs.summary: Returns this instance of PresenceState as a serialized xml.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsManual { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether this presence is set manually or automatically.

remarks.para: will generally have this flag set to true, while other state types will have flag set to false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime LastActive { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the last active time.

remarks.para: Returns DateTime.MinValue if this property is not applicable for this presence state type.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the meeting location.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MeetingSubject { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the meeting subject.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PersistentOnline As PresenceState

Docs.summary: Aggregate Presence State is Online, only used as presence for applications like BOT.

remarks.para: Availability is 3500 and activity is "online".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceState PhoneInACall(string phoneUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function PhoneInACall (phoneUri As String) As PresenceState

Docs.param: The tel URI for the presence state.
Docs.summary: Returns the phone state as on-the-phone.

remarks.para: Availability is 6500 and activity is "on-the-phone". Application could use this state to set phoneState for an outgoing VoIP call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.Presence.PresenceState PhoneInAConference(string phoneUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function PhoneInAConference (phoneUri As String) As PresenceState

Docs.param: The tel URI for the presence state.
Docs.summary: Returns the phone state as in-a-conference.

remarks.para: Availability is 7000 and activity is "in-a-conference". Applications can use this state to set phoneState for an outgoing VoIP call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpiryTime(int32 expiryTime) cil managed

Docs.summary: Allows the userstate to be active for a specified number of seconds.

remarks.para: Setting expiry time to a valid value results in a user state time based publication which would be active for seconds.

Docs.exception: Thrown when expiry time is not between 1 and Int32.MaxValue seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime StartTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the start time from which this state will be active.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StateType As PresenceStateType

Docs.summary: Gets the state type representing this presence state.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TimeZoneAbbreviation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time zone abbreviation.

remarks.para: A 'null' value is returned if the the is not AggregateState, AggregateEndpointState or EndpointState.

Docs.exception: Thrown when the operation is invalid for the given state type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long TimeZoneBias { long get(); void set(long value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time zone bias.

remarks.para: A value of long.MinValue if the is not AggregateState, AggregateEndpointState or EndpointState

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TimeZoneName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time zone name.

remarks.para: A 'null' value is returned if the the is not AggregateState, AggregateEndpointState or EndpointState.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserAvailable As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is Available, Availability is 3500 and activity is "online".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserAway As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is Away, Availability is 15500 and activity is "away".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserBeRightBack As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is BeRightBack, Availability is 12500 and activity is "be-right-back".

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserBusy As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is Busy, Availability is 6500 and activity is "busy".

remarks.para: A time bound userstate is published which is active for 24 hours.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserDoNotDisturb As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is DoNotDisturb, Availability is 9500.

remarks.para: Availability of 9500 is mapped to container 2 and 6900 into container 3(urgent-interruptions-only). A time bound user state is published which is active for 24 hours.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserOffline As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is Offline, Availability is 18000.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserOffWork As PresenceState

Docs.summary: User state is OffWork, Availability is 15500 with activity is "off-work".
